value:
What sort of gifts do you give out for
the Day of Devotion? Or maybe you
prefer to be receiving the gifts...

So your world has a festival to
celebrate love, too? It sounds similar
to the Day of Devotion, but also...$k$pA bit different. Pretty interesting, don't
you think?

Lilina and I are childhood friends.
She taught me all about court
manners while studying in Ostia.$k$pShe also had a large hand in my
looking presentable...

I always thought it would be nice to
have a friendly rival who could help
me reach new heights...$k$pLike my father and Lord Hector.

Everyone always seems a bit restless
during the Day of Devotion.$k$pMaybe they're all just worried about
whether or not their gifts will be well
received.

Are you $Nu?
I have a gift for you from
$Nf.

There are people I want to
protect!

This is all thanks to the teachings
of my father and Lord Hector.

Hmm... Next time I'll just work
harder.

Thank you. Is there anything
you'd like in return?

I'm Roy. I was just celebrating the Day
of Devotion with everyone. Is there
someone you want to give a gift to?

My mother and father gave me the
gift of life, and everyone in Pherae
helped raise me.$k$pWhen I studied in Ostia, Cecilia
taught me a lot and Lilina has helped
me in so many different ways.$k$pAnd now, thanks to you, I've grown
even stronger.$k$pI've always felt that I am who I am
now thanks to all the love I received
from everyone.$k$pSo I want to repay everyone who's
supported me. And I'd like to start
with you, $Nu.
せいっ！
それっ！
うああっ！
The present!
I have a present for you!
With all my heart.
This is for you!
Let's take this to the next level!
I was...naive...
Hmmm....
My name's Roy. I was at a festival packed with people, but now... Well, I'm here.
Wha--?! You scared me!
The most important part of a gift is the thought you put into choosing it.
Something for my father, something for Lilina... Oh, and I can't forget...
What do I want? I'm just happy that you thought to ask.
Hmm... What kind of gift would make a girl like her happy?
Nothing would make me happier than being your friend.
Great!
Worried?
Let's give it to 'em!
